attributes.action: shut down the self appointeted Internernet Watch Foundation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Blocking access to illegal content on the internet especially child porn should be a priority of this government but The Internet Watch Foundation is self appointed and has no accountability.

This should be replaced with a goverment funded independence organisation that is both transparent and accountable to the people, with judges, CPS and police deciding what is illegal or not.

The censorship of the internet should should only be undertaken in extreme circumstances and the events of the last few days where a image was blocked on wikipedia of a album cover, however distasteful that has been on sale in UK shops for years, proves that the IWF is not fit for purpose.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
